entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
